ValidationRule.description: This will prevent Users from updating the Stage of a Deal that is Rejected or Withdrawn
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT ( $Profile.Name= "System Administrator"), NOT ( $Profile.Name= "Integration"), ISCHANGED( StageName ), PRIORVALUE( StageName ) = 'Withdrawn', PRIORVALUE( StageName ) = 'Rejected'
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A Withdrawn or Rejected Deal cannot be re-opened. If you would like have the Deal re-opened by the IT Team, please email the request to support@cvest.com. Approval may need to be requested from management and the head of Originations
